scenario: The modular data centers market is expected to grow by USD 42.56 billion during 2023-2028, with a CAGR of 19.8%. This growth is driven by the implementation of software-defined modular data centers, the need to reduce complexity of traditional data centers, rapid deployment of modular data centers, and the growing data economy globally. Key vendors in the market include Amazon.com Inc., Cisco Systems Inc., Dell Technologies Inc., and Schneider Electric SE. The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the market, including market size and forecast, trends, growth drivers, and challenges, as well as vendor analysis covering around 25 vendors. The study was conducted using an objective combination of primary and secondary information, including inputs from key participants in the industry.
